name: spotify-api
description: * Clone Repo   * Install node.js     * `brew update`     * `brew install node@18.9.0`   * Install npm     * `npm install -g npm@8.19.2`   * Install node fetch v3.2.10     * `npm install node-fetch@3.2.10`   * Install npm dependencies     * `npm install`   * Configure .env file with following vars:     * Port       * =8080     * CLIENT_ID       * Must get from me     * CLIENT_SECRET       * Must get from me     * REDIRECTURI       * ='http://localhost:8080/api/logged'     * CLIENT_REDIRECTURI       * = 'http://localhost:3000/'     * LOGINURI       * = 'http://localhost:8080/api/login'     * USERURI       * = 'http://localhost:8080/api/user'     * LOADURI       * = 'http://localhost:8080/api/load'   * Run `node app.js` to launch local env   * Go to localhost:8080/api/home
